laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Hormonal Evaluation (LH, FSH, DHEA, D4-A, 17-OHP, Aldo)
laboratory_examinations.findings: Age-appropriate levels; high normal F level; PRA normal; low serum T level compared to normal
Low normal sodium; upper normal potassium; normal BUN and glucose
Adequate rises in serum D4-A and T levels; serum DHEA level inappropriately elevated
Elevated compared to age-matched normal values after stopping medication for 2 days
Plasma ACTH and serum D5-17P and DHEA levels exceedingly high; serum 17-OHP and D4-A slightly elevated; low serum F; detectable serum Aldo; high normal PRA; elevated serum LH and FSH
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Similar hormonal findings as at 17 years after stopping glucocorticoids for 7 days
